content.description: domain and range (2017 Spring, Quest, Question 7)

p.line: Given the following error-free expression, what is your best guess as to the Domain and Range of Foo?
Foo's domain is sentences, range is sentences
Foo's domain is sentences, range is booleans
Foo's domain is sentences, range is lists
Foo's domain is booleans, range is sentences
Foo's domain is booleans, range is booleans
Foo's domain is booleans, range is lists
Foo's domain is lists, range is sentences
Foo's domain is lists, range is booleans
Foo's domain is lists, range is lists

content.hint: domain is the input value type; range is the output value type.
